title: namamulanu sEyarE
sahitya:
nAmamulanu sEyare O janulArA

anupallavi

 nAmamu sEyaka narakamulO paDi nAnAvidhAmbula bAdhala nondaka

caraNam 1

 nAmamu sEyare yama dUtalaku pedda nmamu sEyarE narulAra shrI rAma
 
caraNam 2

 anudinamunu I manuja shrIramu asthAniyenci svashaktiyuktamu tODa
 
caraNam 3

 putrAdi bandhu kaLatra vargamulella mitrula naka miku shatruvulani enci
 
caraNam 4

 khala janulanu jEri kAlamulanuvrtha gaDapaka nija bhakti viDuvaka niratamu
 
caraNam 5

 dharmAdi trividha balambula ghOraka marmamerigi mOkSamandu cittamu nilpi
 
caraNam 6

 sAreku hariyandu svAntam-arpaNa jEsi nArAyaNa gOvinda harE ani
 
caraNam 7

 rAmacandrapura varulagu vEnkaTaraMana bhAgavata sannuta mana shrI rAma
